limitInt: Limit must be a positive integer
pageInt: Page must be a positive integer
detailsString: Details must be a non-empty string
expectedbudgetInt: Expected budget must be a positive integer
expectedprofitsInt: Expected profits must be a positive integer
statusInvalid: Status must be one of: 'accepted', 'rejected', 'appoinment accepted', 'appoinment rejected'
searchKeywordsArray: Search keywords must be an array
location.latFloat: Latitude must be a floating point number between -90 and 90
location.lngFloat: Longitude must be a floating point number between -180 and 180
episodesInt: Episodes must be an integer greater than or equal to 0
episodedurationInt: Episode duration must be an integer greater than or equal to 0
appoinmentDateISO8601: Appointment date must be in ISO 8601 format
